channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man faces federal charge in killing of Ukrainian woman on Charlotte train
item.description: The Justice Department has charged a man with the fatal stabbing of a Ukrainian refugee on a North Carolina commuter train.

item.title: Plans in the works for Korean workers detained in raid to go home while fear lingers for residents
Chicagoans change routines as immigration crackdown looms. Some carry passports and avoid stores
